member.name: T:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails
member.summary: Provides details for a network operator notification.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.EncodingType
member.summary: Gets the data-coding scheme (DCS) of the received message.
member.returns: The data-coding scheme (DCS) of the received message.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.Message
member.summary: Gets the message for the network operator notification.
member.returns: The message for the network operator notification.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.NetworkAccountId
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier for the mobile broadband account that received the notification.
member.returns: A unique identifier for a mobile broadband account.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.NotificationType
member.summary: Gets the type of the network notification.
member.returns: The type of the network notification.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.RuleId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the provisioned rule that matched and triggered the notification.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.SmsMessage
member.summary: Gets an SMS message for the mobile broadband account that received the notification.
member.returns: If the network operator notification is triggered by a new mobile network operator SMS, it contains the SMS message object for the network operator notification. **NULL** if no SMS message was received as part of the notification.

member.name: M:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.NetworkOperatorNotificationEventDetails.AuthorizeTethering(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Used to indicate if tethering is permitted for a device. If it is not, a reason can be provided.
member.param: true if tethering is permitted; otherwise, false.
The reason tethering is not permitted.
